name: Crossbow Hero (iconnors)
description:
Crossbow Hero

Immerse yourself in Ancient Greece with this Gastraphetes shooting game. Protect the village from invading Centaurs and Harpies.

The Gastraphetes was one of the earliest versions of what we now know as a crossbow. It was used by the Greeks as early as 420 BC.  Partner that with the Harpy and Centaur from Greek Mythology, and you've got quite an experience.

Made with Unity. Art assets and coding by Ian Connors. Music by Marma: (https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/9508)
